entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Rain mixed with snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
